TetherDB package¶

Submodules¶

TetherDB.db module¶

Database module for TetherDB

class TetherDB.db.Database(db_filepath: str = 'TetherDB/Tether.db')¶

Bases: TetherDB.utils.DBBase

Database class

cleanup(seconds: int = None) → str¶

Purges database documents based on integer passed in either seconds parameter or setting Database.cleanup_seconds.

delete(doc_id: str = '', drop_all: bool = False) → str¶

Deletes a single document with doc_id(int). drop_all param(boolean) drops all documents. Returns str of how many documents deleted.

filter(**kwargs) → any¶

Filter takes in key value pairs to search via an ‘AND’ expression. It will return documents containing all matching key and values. Also accepts trailing wilcards for values.

read(document_id: str = '', iso_8601: bool = True, query_all: bool = False) → any¶

Can retrieve single record with document_id(str). Can also query all records withquery_all(bool).

write(document: dict, device_id: bool = True) → None¶

Takes in dict event and write document to db filepath.
